About us

Innovating Smart Solutions:

Design Criteria, Inc. Leads the Way in Precision Power Electronics for Extreme Customer Requirements, Enhancing Reliability with Compact Designs.

Design Criteria, Inc is a high tech company in the business of developing and manufacturing rugged and precision power electronics to meet unique and extreme customer requirements.

On the average, our power supplies are 42% smaller than competitors with a typical reduction of 50% in component count thus significantly improving reliability.

Additional Innovative Solutions

Design Criteria is an expert in designing and developing products for military and industrial applications.
Clients

World Class Customer Service

Design Criteria, Inc. has developed and manufactured several novel power supply and magnetic products based on our customer's requirements. Our customer base includes branches of the military, DoD prime contractors and dozens of private enterprises.

Innovative Information Blog

Innovative Insights: Your Source for Future-Forward Knowledge.

View all
Dec 25, 2024 • 6 min read

Common Mode Choke

Common Mode Chokes are a type of inductor that specialize in simultaneously "choking" high frequencies and passing low frequencies in an electrical circuit.
Learn more
Dec 25, 2024 • 6 min read

Toroidal Inductors and Transformers

Toroidal transformers and inductors are one of the most widely utilized electrical components because of its abundance of desired qualities.
Learn more
Dec 25, 2024 • 6 min read

Current Sense Transformers

Current sense transformers are primarily used in electric power distribution stations and other generator/power stations because of its propensity to modify secondary alternating current to match primary current.
Learn more
View all
